item.title: FizzBuzz with Pytorch
item.author: edisongustavo@gmail.com (Edison Gustavo Muenz)
item.description: You might say that Software Engineers are mad people. They do weird stuff for no good reason… and you’re probably right! So why not a FizzBuzz in the most inefficient way. This post is inspired by this super funny post from Joel Grus: Fizz Buzz in Tensorflow. Given that I’m working with Pytorch, I thought it would be a good idea to do something similar. So let’s get to the code!
